company_info.Company Description: Dear Applicants,We are a fast growing worldwide travel & tourism company having offices at Kolkata and Mumbai engaged in various services of tourism, E-Education, E-Music Therapy & E-insurance & Associate packages.We provide complete training to our selected candidates to promote our services through advertising in various web portals, social medias, blogs.

jd_information.description: Dear Applicants,We require Business Executives who can handle the below job profile:1.  HR - Advertise, call candidates and recruit them for our company2.  Digital Marketing - advertise & promote Company's various services like e-tavel, e-education, e-music therapy & e-insurance through various web portals, social media, blogs etc.Requirement: 12th Pass and above with Basic Computer knowledge, internet and good communication skills.Only interested, talented, hardworking candidates who can handle the above jobs together and also wants to earn higher income can apply. Freshers are also welcome.  It is an office work and no field works, no targets.  Complete training will be provided by company to the interested and selected candidates.
